title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 328.12 - Appointment of other professional staff
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 328.12 - Appointment of other professional staff

State Regulations

Professional staff not in the negotiating unit
established pursuant to article 14 of the Civil Service Law in the central
administration of the university, other than executive and administrative
officers, shall be appointed by and serve at the pleasure of the chancellor, or
designee. Professional employees in the central administration shall be
appointed by the chancellor, or designee, in accordance with the provisions of

Part 335 of this Subchapter, which shall also govern the terms and conditions
of service of such employees. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
328.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
